de.ityx.mediatrix.api.client

Interface ICAddress


  • public interface ICAddress
    Provides functions to manage the address book objects Address at the client side.
    How to use:
    API.getClientAPI().getAddressAPI().loadAddressbook(id);

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean delete(Address myObj)
      Deletes the specified address.
      List<Address> getAddressbook(int projectId, String text)
      Search the address book of each project to the given search term.
      Address load(int locId)
      Deletes the specified address by the id.
      List<Address> loadAddressbook(int projectId)
      Loads the Address Book using the project id.
      boolean refresh(Address myObj)
      Refresh the specified address.
      void store(Address address)
      Stores the specified address.
